<Crystal Palace F.C.
1:
--------------------
Text: Crystal Palace F.C. (1861):  Along with Wanderers F.C., Barnes F.C. and the N.N. Club, they were described by Charles W. Alcock as being the four clubs who formed "‘the backbone of the Association game’" in its early years.

Triplets:<Crystal Palace F.C.
2:
--------------------
Text: Crystal Palace F.C. (1861):  The club disbanded and disappeared from historical records around 1876.
